title: Make sure Db and Local are thread-safe
DRY
body:
* Using enum to avoid looking up URL twice.
* Deduplicated body of fetch_trusted and fetch_all_ids_recursively

title: Display source of URLs after fetch
Don't create trust proofs for bogus URLs
body: If there's no self-reported URL known, then fetch the URL to find the self-report there. If the URL doesn't contain the identity, then create a trust proof without a URL. This way wrong URLs won't spread through proofs.

title: Maybe url
body: When listing identities with URLs only reported by others, display url in parens.

title: Verify syntax of Ids
body:
Currently it's possible to "trust" anything that base64-decodes, even if it doesn't have the correct length. 

* [x] `cargo +nightly fmt --all`

title: Rename URL lookup fields and methods
body: This does not alter functionality in any way. It's just a rename.

title: Fetch all local proofs, not just current URL
Tracking which URL<>Id mappings have been verified
body:
#298

I think it'd be nice to save verified Id<=>Url mappings somewhere to disk, outside of the cache. Maybe even keep track of all fetched URLs as part of config, because it's weird that `crev repo fetch all` does nothing after a cache clear.

I'm using network for verification. Perhaps WoT could also be used, i.e. if a trust proof of person A I already trust contains a URL of person B, then consider that a valid URL for the person B even if it hasn't been fetched.

title: Fix typo
body:
lose = I no longer have then
loose = not tight Common mistake, possibly even a typo. But it's something! :slightly_smiling_face:

title: Replace outdated URLs with new targets
body:
Hello!

I've noticed that the content of the [URL that is printed](https://github.com/crev-dev/cargo-crev/blob/master/cargo-crev/src/main.rs#L82) when generating a new ID with invalid parameters (e.g. `cargo crev id new`) [has been moved](https://github.com/dpc/crev/wiki/Proof-Repository).

I've updated the URL with [the new one](https://github.com/crev-dev/crev/wiki/Proof-Repository) and also all other occurences where `github.com/dpc/crev` forwards to `github.com/crev-dev/cargo-crev`.

If the changes are made aren't wanted or needed for whatever reason, feel free to just close this pull request.

Checklist:

* [✔] `cargo +nightly fmt --all` (!!! also formatted [code I didn't touch](https://github.com/crev-dev/cargo-crev/commit/6ae38151cb78005527f5ebdb3a3017dd99126b23), see the `use` statements)
* [✘] Modify `CHANGELOG.md` if applicable (not sure if this qualifies as a 

Best,
ambiso
